Text: Have we truly explored all the moral complexities behind Geralt’s choices, or is there always a deeper layer we’re missing—something that challenges our own notions of right and wrong in the Witcher universe?

Comments.Text: The moral ambiguities in Geralt’s choices remind us that right and wrong are rarely clear-cut; there's always more beneath the surface to consider.
